text: An annuity is a financial contract guaranteeing a series of regular payments made at equal intervals over a fixed period of time. It may also refer to: * Life annuity, an annuity in which the term is a person's lifetime * Perpetuity, or perpetual annuity, an annuity from which payments continue indefinitely == See also == * Annuities under American law * Annuities under European law * Annuities under Swiss law
title: Annuity (disambiguation)
